periodicity of the seasonal component in the series, if one exists. By default, we will assume no
seasonal component. The exp smoothing configs() function below will create a list of model
conﬁgurations to evaluate. An optional list of seasonal periods can be speciﬁed, and you could
even change the function to specify other elements that you may know about your time series.
In theory, there are 72 possible model conﬁgurations to evaluate, but in practice, many will not
